ruling: - [[Different Dimension Dragon]] cannot be destroyed by [[Fissure]], [[Mirror Force]], etc. Also, if [[Different Dimension Dragon]] is the only monster on your side of the field, your opponent cannot activate effects like [[Fissure]], [[Mirror Force]], [[Raigeki]], etc.
- [[Different Dimension Dragon]] can be destroyed while in your hand or Deck with [[Chain Destruction]].
- If [[Different Dimension Dragon]] is face-down, it can be destroyed by [[Raigeki]] and similar non-targeting cards.
